title: GC Tactical Masterpiece: How Yates, Visma and Van Aert Pulled Off the Stunning Giro d’Italia Coup
content:
Del Toro, Carapaz were left reeling after Yates and Visma-Lease a Bike unleashed a devastating tactical ambush on the Colle delle Finestre at the Giro d’Italia.

Read the full article at GC Tactical Masterpiece: How Yates, Visma and Van Aert Pulled Off the Stunning Giro d’Italia Coup on Velo.
author: ahood
